coreAttributes.name: pussy pump
coreAttributes.description: This pump consists of a vibrating dildo, which is inserted into the wearer's pussy, and an enclosing shield. At the base of the dildo, there are a series of holes, through which the orgasming wearer's girlcum is drained and sucked down into a plastic tube.

replacementText.self:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] the dildo into [npc.her] [npc.pussy+], before turning up the dial on the milking machine and letting the now-pressurised shield suck itself into place over [npc.her] [npc.labia+]. #IF(npc.getTotalFluidInArea(ORIFICE_VAGINA)>0)
[style.italicsCum(The pussy-pump quickly sucks out all of [npc.namePos] creampie!)] #ENDIF
replacementText.other:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] the dildo into [npc2.namePos] [npc2.pussy+], before turning up the dial on the milking machine and letting the now-pressurised shield suck itself into place over [npc2.her] [npc2.labia+]. #IF(npc2.getTotalFluidInArea(ORIFICE_VAGINA)>0)
[style.italicsCum(The pussy-pump quickly sucks out all of [npc2.namePos] creampie!)] #ENDIF
replacementText.otherRough:
[npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(hold)] [npc2.name] still as [npc.she] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the dildo into [npc2.her] [npc2.pussy+], before cranking up the dial on the milking machine and letting the now-pressurised shield suck itself into place over [npc2.her] [npc2.labia+]. #IF(npc2.getTotalFluidInArea(ORIFICE_VAGINA)>0)
[style.italicsCum(The pussy-pump quickly sucks out all of [npc2.namePos] creampie!)] #ENDIF

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] down the dial on the milking machine, before sliding the dildo out of [npc.her] [npc.pussy+].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] down the dial on the milking machine, before sliding the dildo out of [npc2.namePos] [npc2.pussy+].
displacementText.otherRough: With no regard for [npc2.her] comfort, [npc.name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the still-pressurised pump off of [npc2.namePos] [npc2.labia+] and [npc.verb(yank)] the vibrating dildo out of [npc2.her] [npc2.pussy+].
